question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding Geometric tortoise?
1) It is a critically endangered species of tortoise.
2) They are endemic to the South-Western Cape of South Africa.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The scientific name of the geometric tortoise is Psammobates geometricus. They are endemic to the South-Western Cape of South Africa. The IUCN status of the Geometric tortoise is critically endangered.
